attribute_text:
Frequency
(how often do we have these events?)

Likelihood in the next year
(will this happen next year?)

Speed of onset 
(how fast does it show up 
or become a problem in need of action?)

Duration
(how long does it last if no human action is taken?)

Timing of events
(does this event happen at certain times?)

Potential location of events
(does this event occur in specific places?)
Ability to map hazard zones
Scale of direct impact

Potential for cascading geophysical hazards 
(e.g., earthquake triggers landslides)

Potential for spreading hazardous material 
(if present)
Potential for spreading human disease or creating other health hazards
Potential for causing infrastructure failure hazards (e.g., earthquake damages levee, causing inundation)
Potential for creating new environmental hazards (e.g., decreased air/water quality)
Potential for creating fire hazards
Potential for spreading terrestrial wildlife or livestock disease
Potential for spreading avian disease or health concerns
Potential for spreading aquatic disease or health concerns
Potential for introducing or spreading terrestrial invasive species
Potential for introducing or spreading aquatic invasive species
Potential for introducing or increasing infestations

Ability to reduce/modify the hazard 
(e.g., eliminate at the source, redirect path)
Ability to further protect populations, assets or resources
Warning or detection ability
Ability to control or avoid event as it occurs
Ability to evacuate before hazard arrival
Impact to individual humans
Impact to wildlife
Amount of debris
Impact to land-based transportation
Impact to water-based transportation
Impact to air transportation
Impact to water quality
Impact to air quality
Impact to soil quality

Impact to natural resources 
(subsistence hunting and gathering)

Impact to natural resources
(agriculture, aquaculture, timber, grazing)
Impact to recreational opportunities

Impact to energy and mineral resources
(e.g., mines, oil extraction)
Impact to cultural resources: Archaeological sites*
Impact to cultural resources: Museum/Archival*
Impact to cultural resources: Cultural Landscapes*
Impact to cultural resources: Historic structures*
Restoration of facilities
Restoration of infrastructure
Restoration of cultural assets
Restoration of habitats
Restoration of economic resources
Cost of impacts
Potential for displaced communities
Legal implications
Potential benefits
Potential media exposure
